name: Shadow light
description: Cast shadows from objects with the Shadow Caster behavior.

actions.name: Set light height
actions.description: Set the height of the light.

params.name: Height
params.description: The height of the light to set, in pixels.

actions.name: Set shadow color
actions.description: Set the color of shadows cast by the light.

params.name: Color
params.description: The color of the shadows cast by this object.

actions.name: Set tag
actions.description: Set the tag for the light.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The new tag to set for the light.

actions.name: Set cast from
actions.description: Set which objects to cast shadows from depending on their tags.

params.name: Cast from
params.description: Decide which objects to cast shadows from depending on their tags.

actions.name: Set light position
actions.description: Set the position from which shadows are cast from.

params.name: Light X
params.description: The X co-ordinate of the light.

params.name: Light Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate of the light.

expressions.name: LightX
expressions.description: The X position of the light source.

expressions.name: LightY
expressions.description: The Y position of the light source.
